item.title: Funny Pong
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Funny Pong is an online game that you can play for free. Don’t let the pong ball escape from the screen! Easy play but it is very attracting. Tap on the screen to close the brick cage. Your task to close the cage at the right time, or the ball is drop out and escape. […]
item.content:encoded:
Funny Pong is an online game that you can play for free. Don’t let the pong ball escape from the screen! Easy play but it is very attracting. Tap on the screen to close the brick cage. Your task to close the cage at the right time, or the ball is drop out and escape. Collect coins for extra points. Do you have enough confidence to challenge the high score? Come on and have fun playing Funny Pong!
*mouse**tap*
